website_summaries.verdict: A general-purpose tool kit that is affordably priced and includes 102 different tools to help with a wide variety of projects.
pros: Although not specifically designated for HVAC work, this expansive collection of tools includes essentials such as screwdrivers, pliers, wrenches, a knife, and more
The durable chrome-vanadium steel tools can all be stored in the included compact carrying case
cons: The hammer does not hold up as well as the other tools, and the case seems unable to keep the tools secure during transport

customer_reviews.title: Value & Variety!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter with her first apartment. She should always have the right tool now to safely do any task or assembly around the house. The set isn't what a professional mechanic or fabricator would require but the tools fit securely within the case and the tools themselve are of a nice quality, variety and value for any household repair and should last her many years.
customer_reviews.author: NE IntoMetal

customer_reviews.title: you get what u pay for
customer_reviews.text: All the tools fall out when opened. Too many un-needed much cheap tools in the set. Trump needs to cut back on Chinese junk
customer_reviews.author: DeadeyeDan

customer_reviews.title: SHE LOVED HER NEW VASTAR 102 PIECE HOME REPAIR KIT !!
customer_reviews.text: My girl friend had an old tool box made up of odds and ends. She loves to fix things around her house. When I got her this VASTAR 102 piece home repair kit she got so excited when she opened the tool box and saw all the new tool and she really like how they were a pretty blue color. Received the tool box in perfect condition and all the tools were there. I would highly recommend this tool kit. GREAT JOB VASTAR !!!!
customer_reviews.author: bill cornett

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after visiting a family member and finding out he didn't have one tool in his apartment. This kit is compact and provides what is needed for most any repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has most of what you need
customer_reviews.text: This kit has the tools we need for small projects at the beach house. I have used some of the tools already and the quality appears to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Decent set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very organized with my tools and it drives my wife insane. I always know where my stuff is, but she can never find anything, so in the interest of keeping my marriage happy I got her her very own set of tools! It's a decent set, they look distinct from my tools so they won't get mixed up, and she was very happy with them. She doesn't much care, but I do wish that it came with SAE sockets instead of or in addition to the metric sockets. Some of the parts don't always stay snapped into the case, but otherwise a good homeowner set.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morrisey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The price was low but so was the quality. The finish on the tools is uneven, with random bits of metal sticking out and having rough welds all over. I'm not sure if my box was a prior return, because everything is also dirty and the box is WORN (not the Amazon box, the Vastar box contained within the Amazon box, so I know it looked like this prior to shipment)
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: good to cary in the trunk of the mustang.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our son he carries it in the trunk of his car and it doesn't take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Justchris4now

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and value for a not so handy person. Items don’t stay in place while in there. Slide pieces to open broke off rather quickly. But other than that. It’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Look, I know I didn't spend a lot of money on this entire set so I can't exactly be surprised by the low quality items. But I didn't expect my tape measure to be break after only 2 weeks of semi-regular use (I just moved so I've been measuring walls and furniture a little more than usual). The screwdriver seemed nice, enough though. Buyer be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Sheesh

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of tools for quick jobs around the house
customer_reviews.text: It’s good amount of tool set to have around the house. I love the fact it includes a leveler to hand pictures and other items. It includes a tape measure and a box cutter. Along with many other useful tools for quick jobs around the house
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Zero

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it, these tools are not for professionals - they wouldn't last. But for the occassional home repair Mom they are a great gift - especially since she leaves them out everywhere, loses them and leaves them outside to rust!
customer_reviews.author: Stickler for Accuracy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy! There has not been a tool or size of screwdriver or wrench that I didn't have. This stores nicely upright and the tools stay put when you open it. So far I have not had any problems and use this almost on a daily basis. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good for price if u don’t really need them
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm it’s good value for money. But if yr looking for quality you can feel it’s kind of cheaper. Good for people who barely use tools.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee McAuley

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: I seem to be using these tools constantly (and I'm a girl, mind you, and a musician at that)! They're sturdy and well designed, and I really like the interchangeable screwdriver heads. Now if only they still made handles of wood rather than plastic...
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but pieces fall out of place easily
customer_reviews.text: It works as a basic tool kit when first living on your own. The main issue I had with it is that the tools fall out of place easily making it difficult to close. Also, one of the latches broke off from regular use. I've only had the box a couple years and used it less than a handful of times, so I think it could stand to hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Empson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my daughter who just moved into her own apartment. She can use these tools for herself but I know that they are there when I visit and Dad has to fix something. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: misterdaveusa

customer_reviews.title: Decent but feel a little small
customer_reviews.text: +1 star for customer service. After reading my review, Vastar contacted me directly and made things even better than right. Again, the tool set is decent for the price, just some of the tools feel a little small. -- Decent set of tools for my camper. They dont really feel "full size" but will work for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Good tool set. But need better label.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good tool kit. The only thing I don’t like is it doesn’t have labels for where the tools go in the box. After you take multiple tools out. It’s hard to them back to the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ninh

customer_reviews.title: Keep this in your apartment!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small apartment. Level is great for when you’re hanging stuff up and you have all the tools you need for furniture assembly. Plus blue is my favorite color can’t go wrong lol
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner or back up tool set
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a lot better quality set than I was expecting. I keep mine in the trunk of my car just to have a small set of cheap tools. Would highly recommend this set for a new home owner or anyone that needs a basic tool set.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: i wish i would've researched a little better. this is missing things that are important
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.text: Very cheap tools but work on light duty jobs. Definitely better to go with Pittsburgh tools same price better quality.
customer_reviews.author: matthew garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy if you plan to use these tools on work site. Like an actual job. This is one of those things I bought for my sister's house. Just Incase I'm there and she needs something fixed. If I don't got my tools on me then I grab this handy box
customer_reviews.author: JGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Missing many pieces
customer_reviews.text: Missing hammer. Some wrenches. Blades for utility knife. Horrible quality control to let something with so many pieces missing ship.
customer_reviews.author: Teddi

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for your buck! For real
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little starter tool kit. WAY worth the money. I just needed something for around the apartment to do little projects, hang things, assemble things, etc. You're probably not going to be building a house with this set (probably possible though) but it is more than what I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Has all
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me this to keep in the barn. It has everything I can think of! Nice for having in an outbuilding or extra place where you need compact storage.
customer_reviews.author: H. Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great for home improvement projects!
customer_reviews.text: I got this gift for my dad who does a lot of home projects. He was constantly looking for tools and misplacing them, the product arrived in time and featured a very sturdy tool box filled to the brim with any tool you might need for small home improvement projects. My only complaint is that the cardboard box (not Amazon delivery box) was damaged slightly on one side upon delivery. Other than that small issue it was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amberle D.

customer_reviews.title: Colors don’t match...
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok for the price. The hammer and box cutter colors do not match the other color depicted in the photo. Different blue entirely. I just hope they don’t break when I start to use them. I know it’s not Craftsman tools, but for quality control, you should make sure your product color matches what you photo shows.
customer_reviews.author: BellaRoma

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Nice little residential kit for light tinkering. Don’t expect these tools to hold up to anything heavy though. You’re getting what you’re paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my college age son in his new rental. Works like a charm. And his college colors are blue and white!
customer_reviews.author: Estelle W Harris

customer_reviews.title: Everything we needed or might need
customer_reviews.text: This has everything we needed. One of the more “complete” tool kits out there for this price! Very durable case and nice grips on all tools.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy

customer_reviews.title: Very portable

customer_reviews.text: This kit includes all the basics and I am very happy I purchased it! It's served such a wonderful purpose!

customer_reviews.title: Save your money

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Great home tool kit

Everything snaps in place in the case so nothing is rattling around, as with a carpenter's toolbox. This will be a gift for my 22 year old niece who is renting her first house. Great value and variety for the money!

product_meta.title: Vastar 102 Piece Home Repair Tool Kit, General Household Tool Kit for Home Maintenance with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case
feature_bullets: Includes hammer, level, tape measure, utility knife, pliers, screw drivers, wrenches and more
Handles are ergonomically designed and standard fluted screwdriver set
All the products made of chrome-vanadium steel which is the best materials and allowing quick and easy access
Packaged in a compact carrying case
Vastar 102 pieces home repair tool set for daily home maintenance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars617 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
